I am an Uwe Boll hater. I hate him because of his raging personality and his crappy directing skills and the destruction of the video game adaptions.

BUT! The story seemed extremely intriguing and I went anyways to watch it. I cannot believe I am going to say this but for Uwe Boll, this was actually an "okay" film. This is a film to watch when you have absolutely nothing better to do.

I am just being objective about the movie, I still hate Uwe Boll and I hope he gets sodomized with a baton.

Good movie, the wife scene is a bit sad. Worth a watch. The whole movie is believable, compared to Jack Reacher. The ending is a bit... meh. I mean, the cops could've recognized [main character's name] by just looking at his bold head and the same suit that he entered the building in.
